Title: #78 A Stress Free Plan for Closing Out Your Classroom
Description:
Angela Watson teaches us a stress-free plan for closing out your classroom. See also her 5 Summer Secrets for a Stress free Fall video series - http://cctea.ch/40HW-summer.

Read the show notes at www.coolcatteacher.com/e78 about 5 hours after this show goes live on iTunes. Listen to the rest of the shows at www.coolcatteacher.com/podcast
